transArray.content: The room is small and I had to wait for a long time to get a room. It was already four o'clock in the afternoon. The price/performance ratio is average. There is no other place to choose from in the surrounding area. The space is a bit crowdedðŸ˜¿ðŸ˜¿ðŸ˜¿ðŸ˜¿ðŸ˜¿

Hello dear guest! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. We are sorry that the breakfast did not satisfy you. Due to the renovation time of the hotel, there is indeed a certain gap between the hotel room area and the newly opened store. Although the majong is small, the facilities in the room are complete, and the hotel room and The supporting facilities in the public area can meet your daily living needs. We will continue to work hard and use our careful work to exchange for your peace of mind and comfort when you check in. All hotel staff look forward to your every visit and wish you a happy life. Hotel Manager: Zhao Dan
